name: Interhemispheric transfer test
short_description:
*** THIS IS NOT FULLY TESTED CODE FOR Millisecond accuracy ****

Developed for Psychopy 1.62.01 which can be downloaded here: http://code.google.com/p/psychopy/downloads/detail?name=StandalonePsychoPy-1.62.01-winVista.exe&can=2&q=

Writing a patch for the newest version now.

This project was started because there is no readily available method of performing an Inter-hemispheric transfer test. The goal is to provide a cross-platform IHTT.

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
os.fullname: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
